name: Twinkle
tagline: Make your Blink(1) change color on application change
body:
### Blink(1)

I bought the Blink(1) device on a [Kickstarter project](http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thingm/blink1-the-usb-rgb-led). I hope to do more cool stuff with it!

![Blink](http://cl.ly/Mrlw)

### App

Every time you change the focus to another application you Blink(1) device will change to the color you set in the preference panel. The app is OS X only.

### Change the settings

You can start listening to an application by selecting the application in the list and selecting the  Active checkbox. The color that is set will be the color of the Blink(1) device when you switch to the selected application.

![Settings](http://cl.ly/Mqel)

### Developer

Well, I (@fousa on the Github) created the application so I could play around with the Blink(1) device and it's interface.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
